newsitem.title: FRANCE: Missing French girl's picture put on milk cartons.
newsitem.headline: Missing French girl's picture put on milk cartons.

text.p: Borrowing a tactic from the United States, French dairies have agreed for the first time to print the picture of a missing 10-year-old girl on 10 million milk cartons to be sold across France, her family said on Saturday.
A message on the cartons urges anyone who has seen the little girl to call a toll-free phone number or contact police.
The girl, Marion Wagon of Agen, southwestern France, disappeared on November 14 while returning home from school.
